attributes.action: present a bill before parliament naming the Golden Eagle as the national bird of Scotland and consider other suitable candidates for the other home nations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many other nations have national birds, it is something that presents a symbol of a nation and gives its citizens a non political icon to represent themselves with.  At present Scotland (and the other home nations) has no such icon and we would like the prime minister to create one.  The Golden eagle is the most obvious choice for Scotland as it is already known both within the UK and abroad as Scotland's bird.
